Detailed Description

Use a custom user-provided schedule method to update the learning rate.

Member Function Documentation

float lbann::lbann_callback_custom_learning_rate::schedule ( model *  m,
Layer *  l 
) [protected, virtual]

This is called every epoch to potentially update the learning rate.

Parameters:
m The model being trained.
l The layer in the model currently being potentially updated.
Returns:
A new learning rate.
